hotels.title: Boutique 18th Century Bastide in Charming Provence with Michelin-Starred Dining
hotels.description: Experience all the rustic charm of Southern France at La Magdeleine - Mathias Dandine, a boutique hotel nestled in the heart of Bouches-du-Rh√¥ne. The 18th-century bastide is the perfect blend of classic French flair and modern comfort, offering a serene and inviting atmosphere for couples, families and groups. Spend your days exploring nearby attractions, or stay close to home with a stroll through the hotel's park gardens before indulging in a meal at the onsite Michelin-starred restaurant.
